page.title: 15Yealmpton School Fair
page.content: The School Fair was started in 1964 and was originally held in May. It is now held on the new school site at Stray Park in June. The children in the top class choose the school queen and each other class chooses an attendant. The page is the youngest boy in the school. This is not only an occasion for parents and children but for the whole village. All come and are welcome to join in the fun of the fair. there are many varied stalls and side-shows. The proceeds go towards buying equipment for the{Village Primary } {School}This year{1985 Â£850}were raised and this has provided the school with a television (Â£200), a video recorder (Â£400),the aerial installation (Â£100), agility equipment and books for the library.
